name: School Bus Driver Simulator
description:
Such a simple job, but with a very big responsibility! The School Bus Driver Simulator game offers you the chance to contribute to our future, namely, to transport the children to school. You have to be very careful so that no one to be late.

Game features:
- More than 10 levels with different routes
- Different bus models, starting with the classic American one, following others, depending on comfort, speed and braking system
- Daily Reward which offers the chance to collect more coins

Test your driving skills right now!
